column16:
'desc': [u'

Himalaya Gentle Baby Shampoo (100 ml) Price: Rs.65

While caring for newborns
column17: it is highly important to use gentle products; choose the right shampoo for your little one today. The Himalaya Gentle Baby Shampoo has been formulated so it takes care not to harm the natural balance of your loved one\u2019s hair
column18: instead treats it with utmost love and attention. Ideal for baby boys and girls
column19: this shampoo is infused with hibiscus extracts that soften your baby\u2019s hair and keep it feeling silky always. The shampoo also includes rice
column21:
all organic ingredients that will soothe and protect your kid\u2019s hair all the time. All these components in the Himalaya Baby Shampoo help in cleansing your child\u2019s scalp gently and leaves it conditioned. The shampoo takes proper care to nourish the tender hair roots of your child so your baby\u2019s hair is always strong and grows thicker. Apply this shampoo on to wet hair and lather well because this lather helps to soften and cleanse your kid\u2019s hair thoroughly. After using this Baby Shampoo your tiny tot\u2019s hair will feel soft and become tangle free and easily manageable. This baby shampoo is ideal for baby\u2019s and fights hair fall so your baby never loses too much hair. This herbal shampoo is perfect for cleansing.

\n
\n ']
